translations: n.（因兴奋、疼痛等）尖叫，大叫；狗吠

phrs.translation: 狗吠, 网站, 喊叫, 叫喊
吠声, 尖利刺耳的狗吠声

sentences.sentence: I learn of their Yelp account.
sentences.translation: 我知道了他们 Yelp 的账户。

sentences.sentence: From the corner of the store, he heard his son yelp, "What!"
sentences.translation: 在商店角落里，他听到他的儿子大叫：“什么！”

sentences.sentence: You can write a draft review, but you have to visit the Yelp website to post it.
sentences.translation: 你可以写一篇评论草稿，但你需要访问 Yelp 网站才能发布它。
